name: Kings Gambling
description:
There is a new place for amusement in the fields of far far away! Come in and participate in a relaxing battle of bravery and loot. Every brevage you can drink is included in Kings Gambling.

Today! Free entrance!

Kings Gambling. A paradise of joy far away from the duties of the landlord.

Controls:

Move: A, W, S, D
